devdoc.details: This library handles deposits to and withdrawals from dYdX liquidity pools.

deposit(uint256).details: Deposits funds to the Compound pool. Assumes that you have already approved >= the amount to Compound.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.

getBalance().details: Returns the fund's balance of the specified currency in the Compound pool.

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraws funds from the Compound pool.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.

withdrawAll().details: Withdraws all funds from the Compound pool.

devdoc.title: CompoundPoolController
